name: Roll Out the Walls
description:
- ROLL DICE IN PAIRS  [Left Mouse]

- DOUBLES FORM AN  ENERGY BEAM

- USE WEIGHTED DICE TO GET THE ADVANTAGE  [Keys 1,2,3]

- ENEMIES ARE WEAK TO  THEIR COLOUR-MATCHED BEAM

- YOU ARE WEAK TO ALL BEAMS

GOOD LUCK

Developed by Swordfish games for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
